'''Martino Valera''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A member of the [Valera Family](/valeraFamily/), Martino is a brute with no head for subtlety, making up for it with passion and fervent belief in the inferiority of the Bardattos.

## =Quests

=
* [A Bigger Fish](/aBiggerFish/): To prove your worth, Martino asks you to clear out some Rauataian soldiers at the nearby tavern.
* [Family Pride](/familyPride/): Amidst escalating tensions between the Valera's and their rival family the [Bardatto's](/bardattoFamily/), it's your job to mediate peace and bring the years-long feud to a halt, or assist with either family's schemes.
